title: Smart Data Models mapping of RPaM ontology data model CriterionPropertyDatum
description: The value provided for a criterion property.

id.description: Property. Unique Id of the entity

type.description: Property. It has to be CriterionPropertyDatum

DatumID.description: Property. The identifier of the instance of this datum.

DatumDescription.description: Property. The textual description for the instance of this datum.

items.description: Property. Every element of the description

ID.description: Property. An identifier used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.

Amount.description: Property. An amount used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.

Quantity.description: Property. A quantity used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.

Code.description: Property. A code used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.

Time.description: Property. A time used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.

Date.description: Property. A date used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.

Indicator.description: Property. An indicator used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.

URI.description: Property. A URI used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.

Text.description: Property. A Text used to specify the value of a constraint or as a response to an information requirement.
